item.title: The New Farm Has Lots Of Problems!
item.description: As the crew explores the new farm, they uncover multiple issues that need attention and begin working through each challenge to get the place in shape.

media:content.media:title: The New Farm Has Lots Of Problems!
media:content.media:description: As the crew explores the new farm, they uncover multiple issues that need attention and begin working through each challenge to get the place in shape.

item.title: Don’t Buy a Truck From the Junk Yard
item.description: A risky junk-yard truck purchase turns into a full-blown adventure. See what hidden problems pop up and whether it was worth the gamble.

item.title: Putting the New John Deere 830 to Work
item.description: The new John Deere 830 gets its first real test in the field. See how it performs under load and what the team thinks after a full day of work.

item.title: Close Call with a Field Sinkhole
item.description: A routine pass through the field reveals a hidden sinkhole. See how the team spots the issue in time and handles it safely to protect the equipment and the crew.

item.title: Upgrading the Planter for Spring
item.description: A look at the latest planter upgrades and how they’ll improve planting season. See what was added, why it matters, and how it gets the farm ready for the field.

item.title: Learning to Be On Time
item.description: A look at the importance of timing in farm hauling. See how drivers adapt, improve, and keep the operation running smoothly.

item.title: The Worst Mud of the Year
item.description: A deep mud patch brings fieldwork to a crawl. See how the team handles one of the messiest spots of the season while keeping equipment moving safely.

item.title: Some Farm Jobs Aren’t Fun
item.description: A realistic look at the tougher side of farm work. See the task that made the day challenging and how the team works through it to keep things moving.

item.title: New Salford Arrives on the Farm
item.description: A new Salford unit is delivered to the yard. Take a look at the equipment, first impressions, and what it means for upcoming fieldwork.

item.title: Skunk Surprise: Tile System Clogged
item.description: A clogged tile line leads to an unexpected skunk encounter. See how the issue is identified and safely handled to get the drainage system flowing again.

item.title: Ready to Roll
item.description: Gear is prepped and the team is set for a productive day in the field. A quick look at getting everything ready to roll on the farm.

item.title: A Messy Day Custom Combining 200 Acres
item.description: A big day in the field turns messy during a 200-acre custom combining job. See what caused the chaos and how the team pushes through to keep harvest moving.

item.title: This Almost Went Wrong
item.description: A close call on the farm shows how quickly things can change. Here’s what happened and how the situation was brought under control safely.

item.title: A Journey We Won’t Forget
item.description: A look at an unforgettable experience on the farm, highlighting the hard work, challenges, and rewarding moments that make the journey meaningful.

item.title: Taking On a Pre-Owned Equipment Issue
item.description: A newly purchased piece of equipment reveals unexpected problems, showing the process of diagnosing the issue and getting it back into working shape on the farm.

item.title: Handling a Small Fire on the Farm
item.description: A brief look at a fire incident on the farm and the quick response to manage it safely, highlighting awareness and preparedness during daily operations.

item.title: Finding What We Needed on the Farm
item.description: A moment of success on the farm as a long-searched-for item or solution is finally found, highlighting its importance for daily work and operations.

item.title: Driveway Damage from Hauling Grain
item.description: Heavy grain loads take a toll on the farm driveway, showing how constant hauling can cause wear and the repairs needed to keep everything running smoothly.

item.title: Getting Stuck During Weekend Fieldwork
item.description: A look at a farmer’s unexpected setback while working on a Sunday, showing how equipment gets stuck and the effort needed to get back on track in the field.

item.title: The New Farm Has Lots Of Problems!
item.description: As the crew explores the new farm, they identify a number of issues that need attention and begin working through the challenges one by one.
